alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas; Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 29 at 2:53PM CDT until April 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Localized total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Douglas, Bayfield and Price Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is not expected to impact the city of Superior in Douglas County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
